filmography.title: The Unknown
filmography.role_description: A carnival assistant who has a phobia of men's hands, unknowingly becoming the object of a murderer's obsession.
filmography.plot: A criminal on the run hides in a circus and pretends to be armless to win the heart of the ringmaster's daughter, who fears men's hands.

filmography.title: Our Dancing Daughters
filmography.role_description: A vivacious, free-spirited flapper who represents the reckless energy of the Jazz Age youth.
filmography.plot: A 'modern' girl loses the man she loves to a friend who pretends to be old-fashioned, but the truth eventually comes out.

filmography.title: Possessed
filmography.role_description: A factory worker determined to rise above her station who becomes the mistress of a wealthy lawyer.
filmography.plot: A factory worker looking for a better life becomes the mistress of a wealthy lawyer running for governor.

filmography.title: Grand Hotel
filmography.role_description: An ambitious but desperate stenographer who is willing to compromise her morals to escape her poverty.
filmography.plot: A group of very different people staying at a luxurious Berlin hotel deal with their respective dramas over the course of a single day.

filmography.title: Letty Lynton
filmography.role_description: A wealthy socialite who accidentally kills her former lover and must cover it up to protect her new happiness.
filmography.plot: A socialite gets away with murder when her wealthy former lover dies of poison during a confrontation.

filmography.title: Rain
filmography.role_description: A prostitute stranded on a South Sea island who engages in a psychological battle with a fanatical missionary.
filmography.plot: A prostitute arrives on Pago Pago and clashes with a fire-and-brimstone preacher who wants to save her soul.

filmography.title: Dancing Lady
filmography.role_description: A burlesque dancer who gets a shot at Broadway stardom thanks to a wealthy playboy and a demanding director.
filmography.plot: A burlesque dancer is bailed out of jail by a rich playboy and gets a shot at Broadway stardom.

filmography.title: Sadie McKee
filmography.role_description: A working-class girl who navigates relationships with three very different men as she rises in society.
filmography.plot: A cook's daughter goes through three marriages with three different men—a singer, a millionaire, and a servant—trying to find happiness.

filmography.title: Chained
filmography.role_description: A woman torn between her loyalty to an older, wealthy lover and her passion for a charismatic rancher.
filmography.plot: A woman sacrifices her romance with a South American rancher to marry her devoted older lover out of loyalty.

filmography.title: The Gorgeous Hussy
filmography.role_description: The spirited daughter of an innkeeper whose friendship with Andrew Jackson causes a national scandal.
filmography.plot: The daughter of a Washington innkeeper becomes a central figure in the Andrew Jackson administration, scandalizing society.

filmography.title: Mannequin
filmography.role_description: A shopgirl from the slums who marries a wealthy shipping magnate to escape her background, only to fall in love with him.
filmography.plot: A woman marries a shipping tycoon to escape her crooked boyfriend and poverty, but complications ensue when her ex returns.

filmography.title: The Women
filmography.role_description: A predatory, perfume-counter shopgirl who steals the husband of a wealthy socialite.
filmography.plot: A wealthy woman discovers her husband is having an affair with a shopgirl, leading to a divorce and a battle of wits among her social circle.

filmography.title: Strange Cargo
filmography.role_description: A cabaret entertainer who joins a group of convicts escaping from a penal colony in French Guiana.
filmography.plot: Prisoners escape from Devil's Island and are influenced by a mysterious stranger who may be divine.

filmography.title: A Woman's Face
filmography.role_description: A disfigured and bitter blackmailer whose life changes after plastic surgery, but who must still confront her criminal past.
filmography.plot: A female blackmailer with a facial scar undergoes plastic surgery, which changes her appearance and her outlook on life.

filmography.title: Mildred Pierce
filmography.role_description: A devoted mother who builds a restaurant empire to support her spoiled, ungrateful daughter, leading to murder and heartbreak.
filmography.plot: A hard-working mother inches towards disaster as she divorces her husband and starts a successful restaurant business to support her spoiled daughter.

filmography.title: Humoresque
filmography.role_description: A wealthy, alcoholic patroness who sponsors a young violinist but realizes her chaotic life will destroy his career.
filmography.plot: A talented violinist from the slums rises to fame with the help of a wealthy, troubled socialite who falls in love with him.

filmography.title: Possessed
filmography.role_description: A mentally unstable nurse whose obsession with a former lover drives her into a spiral of schizophrenia and violence.
filmography.plot: A woman's obsession with her former lover leads her into a loveless marriage and a descent into madness.

filmography.title: Daisy Kenyon
filmography.role_description: A commercial artist caught in a love triangle between a married lawyer and a war veteran.
filmography.plot: A commercial artist finds herself torn between a married lawyer she has been seeing and a returning war veteran.

filmography.title: Flamingo Road
filmography.role_description: A carnival dancer stranded in a corrupt Southern town who rises to power to take revenge on the political boss who ruined her.
filmography.plot: A carnival dancer stranded in a small town takes on a corrupt political boss who tries to run her out of town.

filmography.title: The Damned Don't Cry
filmography.role_description: A bored housewife who leaves her dull life to become a glamorous moll for a organized crime syndicate.
filmography.plot: A housewife leaves her husband and rises through the ranks of a crime syndicate by reinventing herself as a sophisticated socialite.

filmography.title: Sudden Fear
filmography.role_description: A wealthy playwright who discovers that her new actor husband and his mistress are plotting to murder her.
filmography.plot: A successful playwright marries a mediocre actor, only to discover he is plotting to kill her for her fortune.

filmography.title: Johnny Guitar
filmography.role_description: A tough saloon owner in the Old West who stands her ground against a town mob led by a vindictive female rival.
filmography.plot: A strong-willed saloon owner battles the local townspeople and a rival rancher who want to force her out.

filmography.title: Autumn Leaves
filmography.role_description: A lonely typist who marries a younger man, only to discover he is mentally unstable and prone to violence.
filmography.plot: A middle-aged typist marries a younger man, but his mental instability threatens their marriage and her safety.
filmography.awards: Berlin Int'l Film Festival: Win – Best Director

filmography.title: What Ever Happened to Baby Jane?
filmography.role_description: A paraplegic former movie star who is held captive and tormented by her jealous, demented sister.
filmography.plot: A former child star torments her paraplegic sister in their decaying Hollywood mansion.

filmography.title: Strait-Jacket
filmography.role_description: A woman released from a mental asylum 20 years after axing her husband, who becomes the prime suspect when new murders occur.
filmography.plot: A mother returns to her daughter after twenty years in an asylum for a double murder, but fresh killings start happening around them.
